name: arin-bot-v2
description: Wingman Dating Helper with Supabase Edge Functions

scripts.supabase:push: powershell -Command "$env:SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN = (Get-Content .env | Where-Object { $_ -match 'SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN\s*=' } | ForEach-Object { if ($_ -match '=\s*(.+)') { $matches[1].Trim() } }); npx supabase db push --linked --include-all --yes"
scripts.supabase:migration:list: powershell -Command "$env:SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN = (Get-Content .env | Where-Object { $_ -match 'SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN\s*=' } | ForEach-Object { if ($_ -match '=\s*(.+)') { $matches[1].Trim() } }); npx supabase migration list --linked"
scripts.supabase:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --linked > supabase/types/database.ts
scripts.supabase:types:local: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > supabase/types/database.ts
